DOC.brief_summary: This study perform reduce unwanted fat arm use new applicator Zeltiq System .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Invasive Reduction Fat Arms With CoolFlex Applicator
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate safety performance CoolFlex applicator flat configuration reduction fat upper arm .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject > 18 year age < 65 year age . 2 . Subject clearly visible fat underside upper arm , generally locate triceps muscle . ( Figure 1 ) 3 . Subject weight change exceed 10 pound precede month . 4 . Subject agree maintain weight ( i.e. , within 5 pound ) make major change diet lifestyle course study . 5 . Subject read sign write informed consent form . 1 . Subject surgical procedure ( ) area intend treatment . 2 . Subject invasive fat reduction procedure ( e.g. , liposuction mesotherapy ) area intend treatment . 3 . Subject noninvasive fat reduction and/or body contour procedure area intend treatment within past 6 month . 4 . Subject need administer , know history , subcutaneous injection area intend treatment ( e.g. , heparin , insulin ) within past month . 5 . Subject known history cryoglobulinemia , cold urticaria , paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria . 6 . Subject known history Raynaud 's disease , know condition response cold exposure limit blood flow skin . 7 . Subject history bleed disorder take medication investigator 's opinion may increase subject 's risk bruising . 8 . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) exceed 40 . BMI define weight pound multiply 703 divide square height inch . 9 . Subject take take diet pill supplement within past month . 10 . Subject dermatological condition , moderate excessive skin laxity , scar location treatment site may interfere treatment evaluation . 11 . Subject pregnant intending become pregnant next 6 month . 12 . Subject lactate lactate past 6 month . 13 . Subject unable unwilling comply study requirement . 14 . Subject currently enrol clinical study unapproved investigational drug device . 15 .
